title: Black Rock City, NV
name: Black Rock City, NV
description:
A Map by Garlynn

The Playa.  Home of the annual burning man art festival.  This map honors the places in the city that only blooms -- or even bothers itself to exist -- once a year, for a week, in the middle of the flattest place in North America.

properties.name: Anyone - what is this?
properties.description: Posted by Jasonblack rock city - burning manObviously something to do with burning man, but what part is still standing out there off season? or is this just a photo that happens to be near the time of the event?

properties.name: Black Rock City - Burning Man
properties.description: Posted by AheilnerBlack Rock City, NV

properties.name: Center Camp Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Garlynn Social hub of Black Rock City. Ice sales, official radio stations, the post office and other city services are clustered around here

properties.name: DPW Village
properties.description: Posted by GarlynnThis is the base of operations for the Black Rock City Department of Public Works. These guys are nuts. Stay out of their way if you can. If you can\'t, they can be bribed with cold beer and other things. This makes them friendly. :-)

properties.name: Da Man
properties.description: Posted by Nym 40.754786911, -119.236402821The location of "The Man", a anually reoccuring wooden effigy that gets burned to the ground. Note: This is an EXACT location, which is used to create the entire city from.

properties.name: Green Gorilla Burningman Camp at Black Rock City, NV
properties.description: Posted by Garlynngerlach, nv...more precisely, this is about where the Green Gorilla Lounge set up camp in 2005. :-)

properties.name: Grooville
properties.description: Posted by XanaguyA band of Seattleites returns to the playa with dance, stories, n1njus, mobile lounges, flying monkeys and more.

properties.name: Site of the Temple
properties.description: Posted by GarlynnWhere the Temple is generally built, further out from the city than the Man.

properties.name: Spacelounge (R.I.P.)
properties.description: Posted by GarlynnSpacelounge. The flyest nightclub on the playa, in its time. 1997-2002.

properties.name: black rock city
properties.description: Posted by Zaphod
